summary: Livingston is trying to merge the Russians, Chinese and Italian gangsters into one group with huge amounts of money and power. FBI agent Susan and DEA agent Max are trying to stop them.
cast: Thomas Ian Griffith|Tia Carrere|John Lithgow|Donald Sutherland|David Hemblen|Carl Alacchi|Robert Ito|Andreas Apergis|Lisa Bronwyn Moore|Kliment Denchev|Vlasta Vrana|Richard Zeman|Richard Jutras|Vik Sahay|Penny Mancuso|Richard Zeppieri|Claude Genest|Mark Camacho|Russell Yuen|Emidio Michetti|Sheena Larkin|David Francis|Matthew Boylan|Kimberly Madden|Jason Blicker|Humberto Arechiga|Philippe Hartmann
title: Punto de impacto
